sentences.sContent: Do you know the family next door?
The Webb family still has its farm over there.
sentences.sCn: 韦伯家依然保留着那里的农场。

sentences.sContent: The family now live in London.
This house isn’t big enough for a family of seven.
sentences.sCn: 这房子住不下七口之家。

sentences.sContent: My family come from Scotland originally.
...said Addison probably overheard a conversation between family members talking about the funds needed to get her little brother to treatment...
...The family turned to social media expressing their gratitude saying...
...I will make more effort to repay your kindness and refresh our family affection...
...I hope that you and your family would come and visit America one day...
...I am writing to express my heartfelt gratitude for the continuous assistance you and your family have offered to me these years...
...your family are fridendly and make me feel at home when everytime I visit you...

...announcing that the five-star rating system that Medicare developed in 2008 to help families compare nursing home quality also has little relationship to how satisfied its residents or their family members are...
...I will cherish the good will and family affection you showed me...
...Rainier's family has ruled Monaco almost continuously since 1297...

synos.tran: 家庭；家族；家属；子女；亲属；僚属

phrases.pCn: 家谱；系统；家系图；系谱图
家庭娱乐室；家人休息室

trans.tranOther: a group of people who are related to each other, especially a mother, a father, and their children
